newsitem.title: USA: Exxon Baton Rouge, La. 68,000 bpd reformer shut.
newsitem.headline: Exxon Baton Rouge, La. 68,000 bpd reformer shut.

text.p: Exxon Corp said it shut a 68,000 barrel per day reforming unit at its Baton Rouge, Louisiana refinery after a small fire there on Monday.
"The unit is down today and we're looking around to determine the cause," said company spokesman Bruce Tackett.
The fire, which occurred around 6 p.m. CST Monday (0000 GMT), caused no injuries and did not affect any of the other units at the 432,000 bpd refinery, Tackett said.
"The balance of the refinery was not affected," he said. It was not yet known how long the unit would be down for repairs.
-- Matt Daily, New York Energy Desk +1 212 859 1620
